quest.name: A Resounding Roar
journal: Urianger's brow is furrowed in thought.
objectives: Speak with Seto and defeat any sin eaters that appear.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I see now what Urianger meant. Our feathered friend is plainly concerned for our safety. We need to show him that we can look after ourselves.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: It's nice of them to worry about us...but we really need those shoes.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Forenameâ”€might I prevail upon thee to confer with Seto in private?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The task of slaying the Lightwarden will ultimately be thine, and it is for thee, I believe, that he worrieth most.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Tell him of thy many great deeds. Spoken in earnest, thy words may yet move him to change his mind.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Prithee do as I bade and speak with Seto in private. I shall turn my thoughts towards other solutions meanwhile.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: You have spoken with my brethren.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Then you see it is not out of scorn that I deny you the relic...

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: I simply cannot bear to see men fight and die. Not anymore. None of us can. To lose one who has placed a gentle hand on us even once fills our hearts with untold sorrow, as my brothers and sisters will readily attest.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: This is something I must do.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'll win! Don't worry!

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: <sigh> What am I to make of such declarations?

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Tell me, why do you wish this?

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: This land is no longer man's to fight for, nor will your doing so compel the fae folk to change. And in order to obtain the other relics, you will already have paid the due price. Naught more is owed.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Why then would you risk all to face our fallen king?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To save the world.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To keep a promise to my friends.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To do what no one else can.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: What...did you say...?

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: The very words... Could it be mere coincidence?

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Very well. You may believe what you say, but we shall see if you have the strength to do it.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Sin eaters have been prowling the area of late. Prove yourself against them, and I will consider giving you the relic.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: See that you are well prepared, then meet me in the clearing to the east.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: There, I will lure out the fiends, that you may slay them.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Whatever Seto hath in store for thee, I wish thee godsspeed.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: I will use my voice to lure out the sin eaters, as I once did when I hunted with an old friend.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: A feeble cry for the ravenous; a mighty roar for the territorial... I still remember the tricks.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: But come. We begin at your signal.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: Ready, then? Very well.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: You made short work of those creatures, I will not deny it...

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: I have seen enough. Let us return to Wolekdorf.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Urianger tells me you've been busy trying to win Seto over, and I agree that you're the best womanman for the job. A silver tongue can only get one so far.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I heard a fearsome roar... Is everything all right?

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: By the ease with which you slew those sin eaters, I see that you are capable.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: However, I still require time to think. And if you should be willing, there is a favor I would ask of you.
